participant_1.background:
My video game collection is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of the good times I had playing games with my family and friends.
i volunteer walking dogs twice a week.
i have been acting since i was ten years old.
I have a job that allows me to work from home so I can spend more time with my family.
my temper is pretty short.

participant_2.background:
I've been to many exotic places, but my favorite is Japan
i like horseback riding.
my mom is a music teacher at the elementary school.
My parents are not tech-savvy, but they are very supportive of my interests.
I like to visit music websites to keep up with new releases and find new artists to listen to.

content.text: What are your hobbies?
I like to go horseback riding and visit music websites to keep up with new releases and find new artists to listen to.
I like horseback riding too, it is really fun!
I know, right? It's a great way to relieve stress and get some exercise.
Yeah, it definitely is. I wish I could go more often.
I try to go at least once a week.
That's great. I'm not as active as I should be.
Me neither, but I'm trying to get better.
Good for you! I'm sure you'll be able to do it.
Thanks! I hope so.
What other hobbies do you have?
I also like to visit music websites to keep up with new releases and find new artists to listen to.
That's cool. I don't listen to a lot of music, but I do like to go to concerts.
I go to concerts too, they're a lot of fun!
Yeah, they are. I've been to a few recently.
Oh, cool! What bands did you see?
I saw The Killers and Twenty One Pilots.
Oh, nice! I love The Killers.
Me too, they're great.
I've never seen Twenty One Pilots, but I've heard good things about them.
They're really good, you should check them out.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
No problem
